channel.title: Notes on M'Sync
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on M'Sync

item.title: The History of Attention
item.description: A comprehensive analysis tracing the evolution of attention mechanisms from bag-of-words models to FlashAttention, examining the mathematical foundations and interdisciplinary connections that enabled modern AI.

item.title: Quick Notes - Hardware-aware programming on MacOS
item.description: Short notes - pointers to programming for speed and efficiency, leveraging hardware-specific features available on ARM Apple Silicon. MacOS-focused at most places, although ideas are easy to generalise.

item.title: MLX
item.description: MLX 20/80. With 20% effort, hope to get 80% covered on MLX's offerings. And, I don't stand by this claim.

item.title: Probability
item.description: Probably definitely incomplete notes on probability.

item.title: Notes for Deep Learning with Python
item.description: Chapter-wise notes for <a href="https://www.manning.com/books/deep-learning-with-python-second-edition">Deep Learning with Python</a> with Python and Clojure code samples. The book is not done. These notes are evolving as I get deeper both into the book and the accompanying code.

item.title: JS Quick Restart for the Impatient
item.description: For polyglots who can't keep too many languages in their heads and need a deep refresher.

item.title: Clojure
item.description: Clojure Notes - An aimless dump of anything and everything interesting I find <em>and</em> manage to record.

item.title: Org-mode Quick Guide
item.description: Summarized guide for features I commonly use, for quick reference.
